methods.doc:
Gets the currently-selected font name.

Note that this can be a different string than what you set with , as the font selection widget may normalize font names and thus return a string with a different structure. For example, “Helvetica Italic Bold 12” could be normalized to “Helvetica Bold Italic 12”. Use Pango.FontDescription.prototype.equal if you want to compare two font descriptions.
